subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Marc-Andre Bergeron had two goals and an assist, and the Islanders scored three goals in a 3-minute-39-second stretch of their 4-1 victory against the Carolina Hurricanes on Monday night.
snippet: Marc-Andre Bergeron had two goals and an assist, and the Islanders scored three goals in a 3-minute-39-second stretch of their 4-1 victory against the Carolina Hurricanes on Monday night.
